snippet: The founder of Lapham’s Quarterly and the rapscallion filmmaker sound off on Norman Foster’s controversial redesign for the New York Public Library, Jimmy Choo leather sandals and artisanal bacon mayonnaise.
abstract: The founder of Lapham’s Quarterly and the rapscallion filmmaker sound off on Norman Foster’s controversial redesign for the New York Public Library, Jimmy Choo leather sandals and artisanal bacon mayonnaise.

headline.main: A Dual Review of What's New, Starring Lewis Lapham and Harmony Korine
